entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
